text: If XSSFWorkbook.setSheetName() is called when you have named ranges set in the workbook, any absolute ($A$1) references in the named ranges are replaced with relative (A1) references. I suspect the problem is actually caused by XSSFFormulaUtils.updateName(), which is called to update references to the sheet.
creator: jclaxton@utilinc.com
dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: Any chance of a piece of code which reproduces the problem? Preferably as standalone unit-test...

creator: dominik.stadler@gmx.at
text: No response for a month so we cannot really work on this, please reopen with more information if you can provide some sample code.
